entry.title: Fleeing War, Ukrainians With Cancer Find Refuge in Europe
entry.content: Revamped hotel in Poland is caring for children whose treatment was disrupted by fighting.

entry.title: Ukraine Rushes to Evacuate Civilians in East as Russia's Offensive Pushes Forward
entry.content: The main cities in the Ukrainian-controlled parts of the region have already turned into ghost towns, with almost all stores and businesses closed, streets emptied and only a handful of apartments in each block still inhabited.
